did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First United Universalist Society of Victor records, 1809-1926.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First United Universalist Society of Victor (Victor, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Church meeting minutes (1845-1870); society meeting minutes (1849-1958); membership register (1860-1926); marriages (1900-1925); baptisms (1901-1920); and deaths (1900-1926)

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Church meeting minutes (1845-1870); society meeting minutes (1849-1958); membership register (1860-1926); marriages (1900-1925); baptisms (1901-1920); and deaths (1900-1926)
